verbs.description: [ARG1: The east county] [V: was] [ARG2: at center stage] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARGM-LOC: in the controversy surrounding the Trump administration ’s zero - tolerance policy on immigration] .
The east county was at center stage Friday in [ARG1: the controversy] [V: surrounding] [ARG2: the Trump administration ’s zero - tolerance policy on immigration] .
